description:
time: add a test to verify that December exists

Now that we're at the end of November, writing a unit test for
December's existence seems prudent.

messages.text:
On Wed, Nov 28, 2012 at 1:11 AM,  <franciscossouza@gmail.com> wrote:

> NOT LGTM
>
> Failed on my linux/arm.

It's okay. I'm sure the failure is 'armless.

LGTM

Good thing to have a test, though I'm sure we'd hold up Go 1.1 if it
were broken.

NOT LGTM

Failed on my linux/arm.

Thanks team, time was running out.
On 27 Nov 2012 17:34, "David Symonds" <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> Good thing to have a test, though I'm sure we'd hold up Go 1.1 if it
> were broken.
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Will there also be an "Is it Christmas?" test?
